title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.5 - Documents which must accompany the application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.5 - Documents which must accompany the application

State Regulations

Each application for the renewal of a license must be
accompanied by the following: (a) Check, draft or any method authorized by section
114-a
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control

Law for the required fee. (b) Appropriate bond issued by an approved surety company. (c) Certificate authorizing use of trade
name, duly certified; unless applicant is not conducting business under a trade
name, or if such certificate has been previously filed with the Liquor

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
40.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
